projects.name: Final Quest
projects.blurb: Classic RPG Style game a cross between original Final Fantasy and Pokémon games in an all new RPG Action Game.

projects.name: Bring Revolution 60 to PC and Mac!
projects.blurb: Revolution 60 is Heavy Rain meets Mass Effect with an all-girl cast, made with the Unreal engine. One choice changes everything.

projects.name: Pro Pinball: Timeshock! - The ULTRA Edition
projects.blurb: Pro Pinball: Timeshock! remade from scratch and taken to ULTIMATE extremes for PC, Mac, iOS and Android!

projects.name: Minecraft Photo Book
projects.blurb: Help us create an amazing Minecraft photo book containing a fraction of the amazing Minecraft community created content!

projects.name: Every Day is Play. A Celebration of the Video Game.
projects.blurb: A book project to celebrate the game—uniting artists and gamers across the globe through video game culture and creativity.

projects.name: Data Hacker: Corruption - a massive Dual-plot RPG
projects.blurb: Corruption is eating into the heart of all worlds. In the coming war, on which side do you stand?

projects.name: Divergence: Online
projects.blurb: A new type of MMORPG where marooned Aliens, Synthetics,  and Humans fight for control of a vast, open game world.

projects.name: Paranautical Activity - Old School FPS meets Roguelike
projects.blurb: Bringing classic FPS action from Doom & Quake with randomness of roguelikes like Isaac & Spelunky to Windows, Mac, and Linux

projects.name: "World War II: TCG" Digital Trading Card Game
projects.blurb: From former Blizzard Entertainment workers: "World War II: TCG" a Multiplatform Digital Card Game inspired by the WW2 historic events.

projects.name: Ghost Song: A Journey of Hope
projects.blurb: A beautiful 2D sci-fi metroidvania about love, hope, and redemption. Gameplay influenced by Super Metroid and Dark Souls.

projects.name: Edo Superstar
projects.blurb: A fighting RPG with a gorgeous Japanese style! Every backer gets a free download of the game! OS / Android / Windows Phone / PC / Mac

projects.name: CHAOS HOUR - Website Development & Entertainment Platform
projects.blurb: Chaos Hour will be a primary source of indie comics, games and movies which will appeal to geeks and gamers all over the world.

projects.name: Steel & Steam: Episode 1
projects.blurb: Steel & Steam is a retro fantasy steampunk JRPG taking place in a large scale world.

projects.name: Proton Pulse Rift
projects.blurb: Get Ready! You control the paddle by simply looking in the direction you want to move.  An immersive, hands free gaming experience.

projects.name: CHROMANCER Adaptive Strategy Online Trading Card Game
projects.blurb: Free-to-play online "adaptive strategy" TCG with groundbreaking gameplay mechanics, and an innovative approach to virtual goods.

projects.name: Gridiron Thunder - Awesome Indie Football Game For OUYA
projects.blurb: We are creating an immersive Pro football experience for OUYA, Android and iOS devices and we need YOUR help to make this game amazing!

projects.name: StarCraft Universe
projects.blurb: A free to play science fiction Multi-Player Online RPG played through Battle.net on StarCraft II. (No StarCraft purchase required)

projects.name: Learn To Play Music In Minutes  & KickStart Your Brain!
projects.blurb: Piano Wizard brings trusted music video game system to iOS, providing effective and affordable music education to millions

projects.name: 【Project Phoenix】 Japan's indie RPG feat. AAA talent!
projects.blurb: Project Phoenix is a JRPG with a squad based RTS game design, brought to you by veteran developers and creators from the East and West.

projects.name: Dead Rushing HD - OUYA & GameStick
projects.blurb:
*** NEW GAME-PLAY VIDEO ADDED! ***
The Undead are rising and it is up to you to stop them and save the world!
